newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korea's KFA buys 52,500T of Argentine corn.
newsitem.headline: S.Korea's KFA buys 52,500T of Argentine corn.

text.p: The Korea Feed Association (KFA) bought 52,500 tonnes of Argentine corn at $153.50 per tonne on a cost and freight basis on Tuesday, traders said.
Traders said Andre won the contract with shipment for June 11-30 to the southeastern port cities of Pusan and Ulsan.
